title: Automatic 3D reconstruction of vertebrae from orthogonal bi-planar radiographs
details: Y Chen, Y Gao, X Fu, Y Chen, J Wu, C Guo, X Li - Scientific Reports, 2024
abstract: When conducting spine-related diagnosis and surgery, the three-dimensional (3D) upright posture of the spine under natural weight bearing is of significant clinical value for physicians to analyze the force on the spine. However, existing medical …
